targets.rawSql: SELECT last_price FROM tickers WHERE symbol = 'BTCUSDT' ORDER BY display_close_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT price_change_percent FROM tickers WHERE symbol = 'BTCUSDT' ORDER BY display_close_time LIMIT 1

SELECT
  balance ->> 'asset' AS asset,
  TO_CHAR((balance ->> 'free')::numeric, 'FM999999990.00000000') AS free,
  TO_CHAR((balance ->> 'locked')::numeric, 'FM999999990.00000000') AS locked
FROM
  accounts,
  LATERAL jsonb_array_elements(balances::jsonb) AS balance
WHERE
  (balance ->> 'asset') IN ('BTC', 'USDT')
LIMIT 50;
SELECT price, quantity FROM order_books WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND type = 'bid') LIMIT 50
SELECT price, quantity FROM order_books WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND type = 'ask') LIMIT 50
SELECT display_transact_time, side, type,  price, orig_qty, executed_qty, cummulative_quote_qty, status, time_in_force,  display_working_time FROM orders ORDER BY display_transact_time DESC LIMIT 12
SELECT DISTINCT ON (timestamp) timestamp, open, close, high, low, volume, display_time AS "time" FROM klines WHERE symbol = 'BTCUSDT' and interval = '1m' ORDER BY timestamp desc LIMIT 360
SELECT DISTINCT ON (timestamp) timestamp, open, close, high, low, volume, display_time AS "time" FROM klines WHERE symbol = 'BTCUSDT' and interval = '15m' ORDER BY timestamp desc LIMIT 360
SELECT histogram, display_time FROM macd WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND "interval" = '1m') ORDER BY collection_time LIMIT 181
SELECT histogram, display_time FROM macd WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND "interval" = '15m') ORDER BY collection_time LIMIT 181
SELECT trend, display_time, symbol, "interval" FROM macd_trend WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND "interval" = '1m') LIMIT 50
SELECT trend, display_time, symbol, "interval" FROM macd_trend WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND "interval" = '15m') LIMIT 50
SELECT ema_fast, ema_slow, display_time FROM macd WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND "interval" = '1m') ORDER BY "timestamp" DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT ema_fast, ema_slow, display_time FROM macd WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND "interval" = '15m') ORDER BY "timestamp" DESC LIMIT 200
SELECT signal, macd, display_time FROM macd WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND "interval" = '1m') ORDER BY collection_time LIMIT 181
SELECT signal, macd, display_time FROM macd WHERE (symbol = 'BTCUSDT' AND "interval" = '15m') ORDER BY collection_time LIMIT 181
SELECT weighted_avg_price, display_close_time, high_price, low_price, prev_close_price, ask_price FROM tickers WHERE symbol = 'BTCUSDT' ORDER BY display_close_time DESC LIMIT 360
SELECT volume, display_close_time FROM tickers WHERE symbol = 'BTCUSDT' ORDER BY display_close_time DESC LIMIT 360
